verbose_text: In the present study we show that invertebrate SoxB1 homologs possess the ability to functionally substitute for Sox2 and support the self renewing state in mouse ES cells, indicating that the unique function of Sox2 in pluripotent stem cells is based on a conserved function of metazoan SoxB1 proteins.
evidence: SoxB1 homologs possess the ability to functionally substitute for Sox2 and support the self-renewing state in mouse ES
